attributes.action: Challenge to MP's - Live on £7 a day and provide receipts demonstrating how this is possible. NO CHEATING, no claiming expenses as most of us cant
attributes.additional_details: following Mr Duncan Smiths belief that people can live on £7 a day, I challenge the Prime Minister and his Cabinet (infact all elected MP's) to practice what they preach. lets see you live on £7 a day without claiming any expenses as the majority of the population dont have the luxury of claiming expenses when juggling increasing bills. Lets see how MP's cope and I set them this challenge will receipts to be provided for a month to demonstrate how possible this claim actually is.
